title: Marks & Spencer's new Christmas jewellery advent calendar is selling like hot cakes
text:

Alternative advent calendars are all the rage lately, so it comes as no surprise that Marks & Spencer has launched a jewellery advent calendar in store and online.

The British institution's festive jewellery countdown is inspired by the 12 Days of Christmas and boasts a stunning navy and silver design.

It is currently out of stock online , but shoppers can find one in M&S stores while stocks last.

Bling lovers can expect to find a selection of silver and gold jewellery pieces, which are made from Marks & Spencer's Skin Kind metal, meaning they are suitable for even the most sensitive of skin types.

Amongst the treats are two link-chain necklaces that each feature a star pendant and are perfect for the festive season.

Meanwhile, the earrings have a mini hoop design and are adorned with pretty charms like wishbones, crystal moons and stars.

Best of all, you get to enjoy 12 days of bling for just £19.50 - which is about £1.62 per day.

We'd advise snapping one up soon, though, as they are expected to go fast.

Find your nearest M&S using the online store locator .

Tiffany & Co. also recently announced it will be releasing a limited edition advent calendar full of its signature jewels for Christmas - but only for one lucky person.
description: The blingtastic Christmas advent calendar from M&S is filled with pretty jewellery pieces and it costs only £19.50
